title: These plastic silly straw cups. : r/nostalgia - Reddit
body: 1.2M subscribers in the nostalgia community. Nostalgia is often triggered by something reminding you of a happier time. Whether it's an old…
readable_content:
- aerial_view (2017-12-08): These plastic silly straw cups.
- sfdoolmtyac (2017-12-08): We have one of these... and holy sweet candy coated wings of the luftwaffe, how do you get the straw clean? It's been dirty for years, no matter what I do, that straw will never be clean again. I've tried boiling water, soaking it, nothing works.
    - shelly_b (2017-12-08): My kid loved these. As a parent that had to clean one all the time, I HATED it.
summary:
The conversation reflects frustration and dislike towards plastic silly straw cups due to the difficulty of cleaning the straws. Participants express a strong aversion to using these cups, indicating a negative sentiment.
Sentiment: -0.9
